result.execSummary:
The defendant Yolanda M Pope was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-False Representation <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs to be paid $50.00 per month commencing 09/16/2022 and each month thereafter or penalty of civil judgment for non-payment.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

11:16 AM Defendant Yolanda M Pope in court.  Attorney Jessica A Klein in court for Yolanda M Pope.  Prosecuting attorney Charles Patrick Hoffmann in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case called for plea and sentencing.
Court conducts plea colloquy.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 2.  Court finds defendant guilty. 
Recommendations by the State.  Recommendations by the Defense.  Statement by defendant.

The Court Orders the Following:

Count 2:
FINE: $ 442.00

DR GOD Surcharge: $ 10.00
	
DNA Surcharge: $ 200.00

DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 
 
Total costs/fine/forfeiture: to be paid at the rate of $ 50.00 per month commencing 9/16/22.   Failure to pay: will result in a civil judgment.
Authorization to appear received and filed.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:58 AM Attorney Jessica A Klein in court.   Defendant Yolanda M Pope did not appear.   Andrew Nesheim appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization.
Defense requests plea and sentencing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no contact with co defendant/Burlington Coat Factory listed in the Criminal Complaint.

01:57 PM Defendant Yolanda M Pope in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Hearing scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Yolanda M Pope
Current: 6639 N 78th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53223   (Effective: 04-20-2022)
Prior: 5856 N 61st St, Milwaukee, WI 53218

Correspondence to Judge Bohren requesting hearing on arrest warrant
**Counsel notified that an Initial appearance was set for 4/20/22 @ 1:00 pm**jac
11:13 AM Defendant Yolanda M Pope not in court.  Christian Farina appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence.
